task.title: Merchant Onboarding
task.shortdesc: New partners must be onboarded into the system. To onboard a new merchant, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Prospective merchant is identified by Company or Client or requests to be part of program either directly or through affiliate network.
Client, Company Executive or Merchant Manager establishes communication with merchant/affiliate

Company Merchant Manager opens ticket in ETC in “unassigned” queue to have the merchant’s feed and/or site reviewed for basic qualifications (e.g., has a website that accepts Client credit cards, etc.)
After initial feed/site analysis, ticket is assigned back to Company Merchant Manager, who sends onboarding packet to merchant/affiliate, along with feed analysis
Merchant/affiliate supplies necessary onboarding information and updated feed, as necessary
Company Merchant Manager distributes a task list with assigned action items and due dates to complete the onboarding
Task owners respond to the group when their tasks are completed
The QA Lead coordinates verification of the entire onboarding in a pre-release Test environment and notifies the Company Merchant Manager when signed off
The Merchant Manager coordinates the migration of tool settings and various code pieces to production
Once merchant is live on the site, the QA Lead coordinates final verification and signs off in production
Company Merchant Manager notifies the merchant/affiliate, Client business contacts, and internal Company staff that the onboarding is completed and closes the ticket
